title: Oyo to end FY24 with 1500 'Super Oyos'
description: Oyo said it is supporting its hotel partners to improve consistently in experience and aims to end financial year 2024 with over 1500 hotels which can be tagged as Super Oyos.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
